name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: When asked about the #MeToo movement, Bill Clinton said the "norms have changed" for what "you can do to somebody against their will." When asked why he said that, Clinton said, "I like to say things that will haunt me the rest of my life." Kim Jong Un and President Trump had lunch and were served Häagen-Dazs ice cream. It was a special occasion for the North Koreans because they've never heard of Häagen-Dazs. Or lunch. President Trump said Kim Jong Un is "absolutely" invited to the White House. Unless, of course, Kim Jong Un wins the Super Bowl or the NBA Championship. In New York City, an Uber driver kicked a lesbian couple out of his car after they kissed. The real story here is that Mike Pence drives for Uber. George H.W. Bush turned 94 today, and he is now the oldest living president ever. Bush toasted himself saying, "Suck it, Thomas Jefferson."
